parameters.componentSubtitle: A smart 2D grid with flexible columns

description.component: Bulma v1 comes with a new Grid. This grid is a 2 dimensional layout component that features flexible columns: Bulma will fit as many columns as possible, given a minimum column width and a column and row gap.
